intro.p: Implementors should use a strategy to obtain valid references to properties and/or services requested in the dependency model.

section.title: CanResolve(CreationContext context, ISubDependencyResolver parentResolver, ComponentModel model, DependencyModel dependency) : Boolean
section.p: Returns true if the resolver is able to satisfy this dependency.

section.title: Resolve(CreationContext context, ISubDependencyResolver parentResolver, ComponentModel model, DependencyModel dependency) : Object
section.p: Should return an instance of a service or property values as specified by the dependency model instance. It is also the responsability of Castle.MicroKernel.IDependencyResolver to throw an exception in the case a non-optional dependency could not be resolved.
